## Introduction

This very nicely styled app by [Andrew Huang](https://github.com/ahuang11) allows you to compare a single year of data from a weather station to the average of a range of years.

You can read more about the awesome styling applied to the plots in the blog post [Create publication-styled figures with hvPlot](https://medium.com/@pYdeas/create-publication-styled-figures-with-hvplot-using-the-bokeh-backend-b623ab48a5d2)
